000333.SZ.summary: Midea Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells home appliances, and robotic and automation systems in China and internationally. It operates through four segments: Heating & Ventilation, as well as Air-Conditioner; Consumer Appliances; Robotics and Automation System; and Others. The company offers split, window, portable, and dehumidifier residential air conditioners (ACs); light commercial ACs; and commercial ACs, such as variable refrigerant flow, DC inverter air-cooled chillers and mini chillers, chiller terminals, rooftop, and ATW and commercial heat pump water heaters. It also provides T-type, side by side, three cycle independent, two doors no frost combi, double layered tempered glass, and double crispers refrigerators, as well as wine coolers, and freezers; laundry products comprising washing machines and tumble dryers; kitchen appliance products, such as hoods, hobs, ovens, microwaves, slow cookers, dishwashers, and food waste disposers; and small appliances, including kettles, blenders, juicers, mixers, rice cookers, pressure cookers, induction cookers, contact grills, air fryers, fans and heaters, etc. In addition, the company offers air conditioner, refrigerator, and heat pump heating compressors; household and light commercial air conditioner, and washing machine motors; smart logistics solutions; and manufactures and sells robots. Further, it engages in sale, wholesale, and processing of raw materials of household electrical appliances; and financial business involved in customer deposits, interbank lending and borrowings, consumption credits, buyer's credits, petty loans, factoring, and finance leases. Additionally, the company provides Internet of Things solutions for intelligent appliances. It markets its products under the Midea, Little Swan, MDV, Clivet, GMCC, Welling, MR, TOSHIBA, HICONICS, SUNYE, DORNA, and SERVOTRONIX brand names. Midea Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

000921.SZ.long_name: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd.
000921.SZ.summary: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells white household electrical appliances under the Hisense, Ronshen, Kelon, Hitachi and York brands in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company's products include refrigerators, residential air-conditioners, central air-conditioners, freezers, washing machines, kitchen appliances, and other electrical appliances. It also offers after-sales services and transportation services. The company was formerly known as Hisense Kelon Electrical Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

002032.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Supor Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells cookware products and household appliances worldwide. The company's cookware products include pressure cookers, woks, frypans, pots, steamers, kettles, cookware sets, knives, spatulas, thermos and flasks, and kitchen gadgets, as well as vacuum food jars and pottery pots; and small kitchen electric appliances comprise electric rice cookers, induction hobs, soymilk makers, electric kettles, food preparation products, electric steamers, slow cookers, baking pans, bread makers, noodle makers, and actifry products. It also offers large kitchen appliances, including sets, range hoods, gas stoves, steam stoves, electric ovens, and sterilizers; and home and personal care appliances, such as vacuum cleaners, garment steamers, steam irons, and air purifiers, as well as sauce pans, steamers, thermal pots, crispers, juice extractors, electric chafing dish products, food processors, gas cookers, water purifiers, and dust cleaners. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002035.SZ.summary: Vatti Corporation Limited produces and sells household appliances in the People's Republic of China. The company offers fitted kitchens, gas appliances, kitchen appliances, sanitary products, household electric appliances, stoves, lampblack machines, hobs, water heaters, steaming machines, ovens, disinfection cabinets, kitchen cabinets, cooker hoods, sterilizers, and cupboards. It also engages in the import and export activities. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China.

002076.SZ.summary: Cnlight Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells lighting products in China. It offers LED lighting products comprising LED bulbs, spotlights, ceiling lights, panel lights, tube lights, down lights, strip lights, and candle bulbs, as well as recessed LED ceiling lights; and energy saving lamps consisting of high power, single capped, and double capped fluorescent lamps, as well as electric ballasts and light fixtures. The company also provides ceramic metal halide lamps; home lamps, such as cartoon table, eye protection table, LED desk, office table, floor, and dimmable lamps; automotive lighting products, including HID lamps, ballasts, and kits; and environmental purification products comprising building air purifiers, indoor mini air purifiers, and electronic deodorants, as well as UV lamps and sterilization equipment, and ballasts. Its products are used in various applications, such as solid-state, indoor, outdoor, motor vehicle, and special lighting, as well as for environmental purification applications. Cnlight Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China.

002084.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Seagull Kitchen and Bath Products Co., Ltd.
002084.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Seagull Kitchen and Bath Products Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells kitchen, bathroom, and commercial products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers faucet components, drains, temperature control valves, floor heating systems, bathtubs, shower rooms, and ceramic sanitary wares, as well as woodworks, smart homes, and other customized parts in the bathroom space. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002242.SZ.summary: Joyoung Co.,Ltd provides kitchen products in China. The company offers soybean milk machines; juicers, blenders, rice, induction, and electric cookers, as well as cooking machines; and noodle machines. It also provides kitchen appliances consisting of hoods, water heaters, disinfection cabinets, gas stove, steam boxes, and dishwashers, as well as water purifiers. The company provides its products in approximately 30 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions in China, as well as exports to approximately 20 countries, including Japan, the United States, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, and internationally. Joyoung Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.

002375.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yasha Decoration Co.,Ltd primarily engages in the interior and exterior decoration, curtain wall, design and construction, home automation, and building intellectualization, and other activities in China. It offers decoration services for high star hotels, as well as large public architecture and high-end residences. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002473.SZ.summary: Ningbo Sunlight Electrical Appliance Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells thermostats and electric kettles. Its products include electric kettles, coffee machines, temperature controllers, and instant water cookers. The company markets its products in Russia, the United States, Ukraine, Belarus, Poland, the Czech Republic, Lithuania, Bulgaria, Belgium, the Netherlands, Hungary, Sweden, Norway, Chile, Argentina, Uruguay, South Africa, Nigeria, South Korea, Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and other countries and regions. Ningbo Sunlight Electrical Appliance Co.,Ltd was founded in 2004 and is based in Ningbo, China.

002489.SZ.summary: Yotrio Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells outdoor furniture products in China and internationally. Its product portfolio includes aluminum and steel products, meshes, wickers, resin wood and wood products, slings, creatop table tops, and glass table tops. The company sells its products under the Das Original, Royal Garden, SunVilla, and Outdoor Essentials brand names. Yotrio Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Linhai, China.

002508.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Robam Appliances Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells kitchen appliances under the ROBAM brand in China and internationally. Its products include range hood, gas hobs, sterilizer cabinets, steam ovens, electric ovens, microwave ovens, dishwashers, water purifiers, water heaters, purification tanks, electric pressure and induction cookers, electric kettles, and other kitchen appliances. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002572.SZ.summary: Suofeiya Home Collection Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells customized wardrobes and other related furniture under the Suofeiya brand name in China. It offers wooden doors, curtains, sofas, coffee tables, bedding, mattresses, and other home style products; and engineering services for real estate, hotels, enterprises, long-term rental apartments, schools, hospitals, and other engineering clients. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002623.SZ.summary: Changzhou Almaden Co., Ltd. produces and sells anti-reflective coated solar glass in China and internationally. The company offers solar, dual glass module, and photoelectric glass, as well as polyolefin encapsulant films. Changzhou Almaden Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

002677.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Meida Industrial Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells kitchen electrical appliances in China. It offers a range of kitchen products, including hoods, stoves, cookers, disinfection cabinets, storage cabinets, electrical ovens, water purifiers, sinks, and electrical steamers. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Haining, China.

002713.SZ.long_name: Dong Yi Ri Sheng Home Decoration Group Co.,Ltd.
002713.SZ.summary: Dong Yi Ri Sheng Home Decoration Group Co.,Ltd. operates in the home decoration industry. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002723.SZ.summary: KENNEDE Electronics MFG. Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of rechargeable standby lanterns and DC-AC rechargeable fans in China. Its rechargeable standby lanterns include three series, indoor and outdoor rechargeable standby lanterns, rechargeable flashlights, and fire emergency lights; and DC-AC rechargeable fans comprise two series, DC-AC rechargeable table fans, and floor fans, as well as lamps. The company offers its products for applications in fields, such as standby lights for civilian use, industrial standby lights, outdoor sports, outdoor life, military remote control lights, etc. It also exports its products to approximately 90 countries and regions. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Jiangmen, China.

002759.SZ.summary: Guangdong Tonze Electric Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells household and medical appliances in China. Its products include electric kettles, stew pots, rice cookers, electric cookers, steam cuisines, health pots, and yoghourt makers, as well as NTC thermistor temperature sensors. The company also offers medical instruments, such as digital thermometers and blood pressure monitors. Guangdong Tonze Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shantou, China.

002818.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Fusen Noble-House Industrial Co., Ltd.
002818.SZ.summary: Chengdu Fusen Noble-House Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the development, rental, and service of decorative building materials and home furnishing markets. It offers sanitary ware, such as toilet bowls, basins, bathtubs, shower rooms, sauna, bathroom cabinets, faucets, showers, hardware pendants, and accessories and drainers; hardware products, including paints, ceiling materials, wall and floor tiles, stones, central heating systems, and floor products; and doors and windows. The company also provides bedroom, living room, study, restaurant, and bathroom furniture; furniture materials; household goods, which include pillows, cleaning tools, storage boxes and bags, and drying racks and poles; kitchen and bathroom appliances comprises water heaters, cookers, disinfection cabinets, hoods, home theatres, and smart home products; and lighting fixtures consisting of ceiling, floor, wall, and table lamps, as well as down and sport lights, and chandeliers. In addition, it operates as a decorative design and decoration company. The company sells its products through malls, franchised malls, and specialty stores. Chengdu Fusen Noble-House Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002853.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Piano Customized Furniture Co., Ltd.
002853.SZ.summary: Guangdong Piano Customized Furniture Co., Ltd. develops and sells home improvement solutions. Its products include cabinet and kitchen electrical products. Guangdong Piano Customized Furniture Co., Ltd. offers its products through stores, franchisees, and dealers. The company is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.

003011.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Walrus New Material Co.,Ltd. provides elastic flooring products under the Walrus brand. It offers WPC, SPC, LVT, and carpet pattern series products, as well as after-sales services. The company is based in Haining, China.

0531.HK.summary: Samson Holding Ltd., an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, markets, trades in, and sells residential and commercial furniture in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, the United States, Bangladesh, Vietnam, and internationally. It offers furniture for homes, as well as hotels and offices; and procurement services. The company markets its furniture products under the Universal Furniture, Miranda Kerr Home, Coastal Living Home Collection, Legacy Classic Furniture, Legacy Classic Kids, Craftmaster Furniture, Baker, Milling Road, McGuire, LacquerCraft Hospitality, Universal Furniture China and Athome, Rachael Ray, Paula Deen Home, Legacy, Craftmaster Furniture, Wendy Bellissimo, and Grand Manor brands. Samson Holding Ltd. primarily serves department stores, furniture stores, internet retailers, and mass merchant stores. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jiashan, China. Samson Holding Ltd. is a subsidiary of Advent Group Limited.

0837.HK.summary: Carpenter Tan Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and distributes wooden handicrafts and accessories. It offers wooden or horn combs, such as colored drawing combs, grass-and-tree dyed wooden combs, and carved combs; pocket-size wooden mirrors, including colored drawing mirrors and carved mirrors; other wooden accessories and adornments comprising bead bracelets, pendants, barrettes, hair bobs, and massage tools; and box sets that combine its products in themes for gift purpose. The company sells its products primarily under the Carpenter Tan brand name. It is also involved in the operation of retailing shops in Hong Kong, as well as franchise and distribution network primarily in the People's Republic of China; distribution of wooden handicrafts and accessories through Internet; and property investment activities. As of December 31, 2020, the company had 1,155 franchised stores; and 4 directly-operated outlets. Carpenter Tan Holdings Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jurong, the People's Republic of China.

0921.HK.long_name: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd.
0921.HK.summary: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells white household electrical appliances under the Hisense, Ronshen, Kelon, Hitachi and York brands in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company's products include refrigerators, residential air-conditioners, central air-conditioners, freezers, washing machines, kitchen appliances, and other electrical appliances. It also offers after-sales services and transportation services. The company was formerly known as Hisense Kelon Electrical Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

1237.HK.long_name: China Environmental Technology and Bioenergy Holdings Limited
1237.HK.summary: China Environmental Technology and Bioenergy Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells outdoor wooden products in the People's Republic of China, North America, Europe, other Asia Pacific, and Australasia. The company operates through three segments: Manufacturing and Sales of Wooden Products; Retail Sales of Outdoor Wooden Products; and Manufacturing and Sales of Renewable Energy Products. It produces and sells timber houses, and related parts and structures. The company offers timber villas for leisure resort clubs, tourist scenic spots, and parks; non-residential timber sheds for leisure or storage purposes, including pavilions and gazebos, etc.; and timber logs. It also provides recreational products, such as play swings, sand tables, and outdoor rocking chairs for children for public parks and private gardens, and courtyards; outdoor furniture products comprising tables and chairs; indoor furniture products consisting of beds and cabinets; landscape garden products, such as flower carts, railings, and litter bins for use in gardens, scenic spots, courtyards, and parks; and pet-home products, including bird houses, dog homes and playhouses, rabbit hutches, hamster cages, etc. In addition, the company trades in timber; and recycles and produces biomass pellet fuels. Further, it is involved in the retail sale of outdoor wooden products through self-operated retail shops. The company was formerly known as Merry Garden Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Environmental Technology and Bioenergy Holdings Limited in June 2016. China Environmental Technology and Bioenergy Holdings Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Zhangping, China.

1575.HK.summary: Morris Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells upholstered sofas, sofa covers, and other furniture products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through Retail and Manufacturing segments. It offers stationary sofas and motion sofas, as well as sofas with smart home features, such as audio, massage, beverage cooling, Bluetooth, and USB port connections. The company offers its products under the Morrisofa brand name through its flagship stores. Morris Holdings Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Haining, the People's Republic of China.

1715.HK.summary: Miji International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, develops, manufactures, and sells kitchen appliances to middle and upper-class customers primarily in the People's Republic of China. It provides radiant and induction hobs and stoves, pots and pans, hoods, kettles, bakery ovens, kitchen cabinets, and other small kitchen appliances under the Miji, Miji Design, Miji Home, and Miji Pro brand names. The company offers its products through distributors, consignment sales, television platforms, and corporate clients, as well as online platforms. Miji International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

200512.SZ.summary: TsannKuen (China) Enterprise Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells household appliances, electronics, light industrial products, and office supplies in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company also engages in the design and manufacture of molds for products; and provision of related after-sales services. In addition, it is involved in the import and export of household appliances, electronic products, electrical equipment, office supplies, kitchen utensils, and pre-packaged foods. The company was formerly known as TsannKuen China (Xiamen) Ltd. and changed its name to TsannKuen (China) Enterprise Co., Ltd. in June 1993. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Zhangzhou, the People's Republic of China. TsannKuen (China) Enterprise Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Star Comgistic Capital Co.,Ltd.

2127.HK.summary: Huisen Household International Group Limited manufactures and sells furniture products for home, office, and commercial use in the People's Republic of China. The company primarily offers panel and metal furniture on original design manufacturing and original equipment manufacturing basis. Its products include panel furniture, such as television cabinets, bookshelves, shelves, desks, and coffee tables; upholstered furniture, including sofas; outdoor furniture comprising outdoor tables, outdoor stools, and fire pit tables; and sports and recreational equipment, such as table tennis tables, foosball tables, and pool tables, as well as particleboards. The company also exports its products. Huisen Household International Group Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Ganzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300160.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Xiuqiang Glasswork Co., Ltd. operates as a glass processing company in China. It primarily produces touch screen cover glasses, thin film battery glasses, photovoltaic coated glasses, ITO glasses, home appliance crystal glasses, and home glass products. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries. Jiangsu Xiuqiang Glasswork Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Suqian, China.

300247.SZ.summary: LeKing Wellness Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sauna equipment in China. Its products include infrared sauna, traditional sauna, and foot sauna products; and portable steam and infrared sauna products, as well as air purifiers. The company also offers carbon heating painting products, functional sofas and chairs, and SUP and boat products. It exports its sauna products to approximately 70 countries. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

300464.SZ.long_name: Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
300464.SZ.summary: Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of slides, hinges, and other hardware primarily in China. The company offers double wall drawers; concealed, ball bearing, and Euro slides; furniture hardware products; and household product solutions. It serves various industries, including furniture, electrical equipment, financial equipment, automobile, IT, etc. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Japan, South Korea, and approximately 100 other countries or regions. Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Foshan, China.

300616.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd.
300616.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells customized panel furniture in China. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Shangpin Zhaipei Household Products Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd. in August 2012. Guangzhou Shangpin Home Collection Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300632.SZ.summary: Xiamen Guangpu Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of LED packaging and application products in China. It offers LED panel lights, LED ceiling lights, LED lights, LED downlights, LED light sources, LED landscape lightings, LED bracket lights, LED night lights; CHIP series; LED backlight modules; and FPC products. Xiamen Guangpu Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300749.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Topstrong Living Innovation and Integration Co., Ltd.
300749.SZ.summary: Guangdong Topstrong Living Innovation and Integration Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of home furnishing products worldwide. It offers wardrobe products; hardware products, including intelligent door lock systems, security door lock systems, and art hardware systems; and ecotypic, bathroom, and hollow doors. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

300894.SZ.summary: Marssenger Kitchenware Co., Ltd. engages in the production, trade, and sale of integrated stoves and integrated sinks. The company is based in Haining, China.

300911.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Entive Smart Kitchen Appliance Co., Ltd.
300911.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Entive Smart Kitchen Appliance Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of kitchen appliances and stainless-steel cabinet products. Its products include integrated steaming, steamer, disinfection cabinet, oven, and dishwasher stoves, as well as cupboard and dishwasher integrated sinks, and built-in steam ovens, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

600337.SS.long_name: Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd.
600337.SS.summary: Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells home furniture products. It operates and franchises 258 retail stores under the Markor Home Furnishings, A.R.T., A.R.T. West Side, Caracole, YVVY, Zest Home, and Rehome, as well as Jonathan Charles and Rowe brands in 95 cities in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as Markor International Furniture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. in July 2014. Markor International Home Furnishings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600562.SS.summary: Glarun Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of ceramic and related products in China and internationally. It offers ceramic tableware, tea sets, bottles, and cups; art plates; and porcelain products for offices and hotels. The company also provides environmental protection equipment; and packaging materials and products. Glarun Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

600651.SS.summary: Shanghai Feilo Acoustics Co., Ltd engages in research, development, and production of lighting products in China and internationally. It offers landscape lighting, road lighting, automotive lighting, indoor lighting, and other commercial lighting products, as well as electrical appliances, lamps and lanterns, and parts and components under the Ya and Sylvania brands. The company is also involved in the research and development, production, sale, and installation of LED products. Shanghai Feilo Acoustics Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600854.SS.long_name: Jiangsu chunlan refrigerating equipment stock co.,ltd.
600854.SS.summary: Jiangsu chunlan refrigerating equipment stock co.,ltd. manufactures and sells residential and commercial air conditioners in China and internationally. Its residential air conditioner products include floor standing, window, and wall split products; and commercial air conditioner products, such as dehumidifier, cassette, floor-standing, duct, enclosure, and outdoor unit products, as well as air cooler water, water cooled screw, and centrifugal chillers. The company also provides lithium and nickel metal hydride batteries, and battery management systems used in new energy vehicles, maglev trains, electric energy storage power stations, residential and container energy storage, automatic guided vehicles, industrial robots, communication base station back-up power supplies, and solar energy and wind energy storage systems. In addition, it offers bagged and bagless canister, stick, and wet and dry vacuum cleaners; energy storage mobile AC products; and air purifiers. Further, the company is involved in the financial and investment businesses, such as finance, securities, exchange, fund, insurance, equity, high-tech venture fund, etc.; and the manufacture and supply of machinery products for use in home appliance, machinery, molding and railway transportation, etc. Additionally, it develops and operates real estate properties, as well as offers related services; and operates Taizhou Chunlan Hotel and Chunlan Guest Hotel. The company is based in Taizhou, China.

600983.SS.summary: As of April 29, 2021,  operates as a subsidiary of Guangdong Galanz Household Appliances Manufacturing Co., Ltd.

603008.SS.summary: Xilinmen Furniture Co.,Ltd designs, develops, produces, and sells furniture products in China. The company offers mattresses, cabinets, bed stools, tables, TV cabinets, sofas, and soft beds for bedroom; sofas, tables, corner a few, and TV cabinets for living room; dining tables and chairs, sideboards, and wine cabinets for restaurants; desks, book chairs, and bookcases for study; and children's mattress, beds, desks, chairs, and bookcases. It also provides pillows, bedding kits, home decoration products, and table lamps. The company offers its products under the Hiro Gate, Frenchman, Erna, love times, BBR, Brano, and other brands. Xilinmen Furniture Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

603038.SS.summary: Dongguan Huali industries Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells decorative composite materials in China. The company's products include edge, shaped, and other decorative materials, as well as PVC and furniture edge banding materials for use in the edge sealing, surface decoration, and indoor decoration of panel furniture decoration. Dongguan Huali Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Dongguan, China.

603208.SS.long_name: Jiangshan Oupai Door Industry Co., Ltd
603208.SS.summary: Jiangshan Oupai Door Industry Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of wooden doors in China. It offers wooden doors for bedrooms, kitchen and bath rooms, and living rooms, as well as provides wooden door accessories. The company markets its products through approximately 2,000 terminal stores. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Africa, and internationally. The company is based in Jiangshan, China.

603226.SS.summary: Vohringer Home Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells wooden flooring products in China. It offers laminate flooring, solid wood flooring, and cabinet furniture products. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shanghai, China.

603268.SS.summary: Guangdong Songfa Ceramics Co.,Ltd. designs, produces, and sells chinaware products worldwide. It operates through three divisions: Family Use Chinaware, Tailor Made Chinaware, and Hotel Use Chinaware. The company offers a line of household products, including tableware, tea and coffee sets, decorative chinaware products, and collections, as well as stainless steel, crystal, and glass household products. It also provides dinnerware, and cups and saucers, as well as tailor made products for families, businesses, and weddings. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chaozhou, China.

603313.SS.summary: Healthcare Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells memory foam products in China. The company provides foam toppers, mattresses, sofas, and pillows. It also sells its products under the MLILY brand through company-owned retail shops. The company also exports its products to Europe, Russia, the Middle East, and North Africa. Healthcare Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Rugao, China.

603326.SS.summary: Nanjing OLO Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells home furnishing products in China. It offers kitchen cabinets and full-house furniture. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Nanjing, China.

603486.SS.summary: Ecovacs Robotics Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, design, manufacture, and sale of robotic products. Its products include DEEBOT, a floor-cleaning robot; WINBOT, a window-cleaning robot; ATMOBOT, a mobile air-purifier robot; and BENEBOT, a shopping assistance robot. The company has operations in China, Japan, Germany, the United States, Canada, the Czech Republic, France, Iran, Malaysia, Poland, Spain, Switzerland, and internationally. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Suzhou, China.

603515.SS.summary: Opple Lighting Co.,LTD. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells lighting products primarily in China. The company's products include LED and traditional light products, lamps, ceiling fixtures, and electrical appliances. It offers LED bulbs, candles, spots, filaments, battens, soft strips, tubes, and modules; LED Home Luminaires, such as ceiling, decorative, table, mirror, and other products; and LED Professional Luminaires, including downlights, spotlights, panels, linear indoor products, industrial lighting, and outdoor light products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603551.SS.summary: AUPU Home Style Corporation Limited provides various household products in China. Its products include integrated ceilings, water heaters, lighting, fresh air systems, integrated walls, integrated stoves, clothes dryers, ventilation fans, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

603610.SS.summary: Keeson Technology Corporation Limited develops, manufactures, and sells smart bedroom furniture. The company provides smart adjustable electric beds and mattresses. Keeson Technology Corporation Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

603661.SS.long_name: Zhejiang Henglin Chair Industry CO., LTD.
603661.SS.summary: Zhejiang Henglin Chair Industry CO., LTD. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of office chairs, sofas, massage chairs, and accessories in China. It also exports its products to approximately 80 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Henglin Chair Industry Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Henglin Chair Industry CO., LTD. in December 2007. Zhejiang Henglin Chair Industry CO., LTD. was founded in 1998 and is based in Huzhou, China.

603709.SS.summary: Zoy Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd. designs, produces, and sells furniture worldwide. It offers motion, power motion, and stationary sofas, as well as accent chairs, push back and lift recliners, and office chairs; and zaisu, thera, block, prado, X-space, puzzle, and delano products. The company was formerly known as Home Furnishing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zoy Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd. in November 2015. Zoy Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

603801.SS.summary: Zbom Home Collection Co.,Ltd manufactures and distributes kitchen and bathroom cabinets in China and internationally. It also offers closets and hardware products. The company was formerly known as Zbom Cabinets Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Zbom Home Collection Co.,Ltd in August 2018. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hefei, China.

603816.SS.summary: Jason Furniture (Hangzhou) Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of home furnishing products in China and internationally. It offers motion and stationary sofas, and accent and recliner chairs; dining chairs, ottomans, and benches and banquettes; beds; and spring, hybrid, and foam mattresses. The company sells its products under the KUKAHOME brand name. It operates through 4500 brand stores. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Zhuangsheng Furniture Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jason Furniture (Hangzhou) Co.,Ltd. in December 2011. Jason Furniture (Hangzhou) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

603833.SS.summary: Oppein Home Group Inc. operates as a cabinetry manufacturer in Asia. The company offers kitchen and bathroom cabinets, wardrobes, interior doors, solid surfaces, kitchen electrical appliances and accessories, home furniture, and other building materials. It sells its products and services to builders, contractors, project brokers, and building design companies. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Optima Enterprise Co., Ltd and changed its name to Oppein Home Group Inc. in 2010. Oppein Home Group Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

603838.SS.short_name: GUANG DONG SITONG GROUP CO LTD
603838.SS.summary: Guang Dong Sitong Group Co.,Ltd researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells ceramic products in China and internationally. The company offers tabletop products, such as house and hotel wares; and accessories, including vases, candle holders, trays, and wall decors. It also provides sanitary ware products comprising one and two piece, and intelligent toilets; bidets; pedestal, cabinet, art, counter top, and under counter basins; bathroom vanities; squatting pans; and urinals, as well as bathroom accessories. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Chaozhou, China.

603848.SS.summary: Guangdong Hotata Technology Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of household drying appliances in China. It offers smart clothes washing machines, hand-cranked products, smart products, aluminum ladder products, and home boutiques, as well as floating and floor products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

603898.SS.summary: Guangzhou Holike Creative Home Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of panel furniture in China. The company also develops and sells finished furniture and soft furnishings. It offers alpine, Baikal, Bordeaux Manor, Norwegian forest, sky city, Monterey, Monet, 3D printing, ink danqing, metal, lanting, carving, minimalist, Philadelphia, Aegean coast, jane fashion, Nordic style, and Capri series products, such as leather and cloth sofas, mattresses, coffee and bedside tables, and wooden doors and chairs, as well as wall skirt decoration systems and gift products. The company operates a network of marketing service centers in 10 provinces, as well as dealers in approximately 1,600 cities in China; and 1500 brand stores. Guangzhou Holike Creative Home Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

605318.SS.long_name: Fsilon Furnishing and Construction Materials Corporation
605318.SS.summary: Fsilon Furnishing and Construction Materials Corporation operates as a ceiling manufacturer in Russia, East Asia, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It offers living room ceiling and integrated wall decoration products, as well as steel joist products, such as light steel and triangular keels, widening corner lines, and hanging pieces. The company is based in Jiaxing, China.

8005.HK.summary: Yuxing InfoTech Investment Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily manufactures, sells, and distributes information home appliances and complementary products to consumer markets in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Australia, and internationally. It operates through Information Home Appliances, Internet Data Centre (IDC), Investing, Leasing, and Other Operations segments. The company provides broadband internet digital audio and video products; and develops, constructs, operates, merges, acquires, and leases properties that are used as IDC. It also offers high digital set-top box (STB), hybrid dual mode STB, over-the-top/Internet protocol television STB, STB equipped with an Android system products, etc. In addition, the company trades in securities; invests in financial instruments; provides investment consultancy and trustee services; and holds and leases properties. Further, it is involved in the distribution and trade of electronic components and miscellaneous products; provision of asset management services; and research and development, and software designing activities. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

900939.SS.long_name: Shanghai Huili Building Materials Co., Ltd.
900939.SS.summary: Shanghai Huili Building Materials Co., Ltd. operates as a building materials company in China. It is involved in the production and sale of coatings, PC sheets, wooden products, doors and windows curtain walls, flooring products, floor substrates, and other products under the Huili brand. The company primarily serves real estate companies. Shanghai Huili Building Materials Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

DEER.summary: Deer Consumer Products, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of small home and kitchen electronic appliances. It offers blenders, juicers, soy milk makers, food processors, popcorn makers, meat grinders, coffee machines, and hot water kettles primarily under the Deer brand name, as well as under one store brand for retailer's private label programs. Deer Consumer Products also offers humidifiers and dehumidifiers, rice cookers, and toasters. The company sells its products to consumer product companies internationally; and to retail stores through agents in the People's Republic of China. It also operates as an original design manufacturer and original equipment manufacturer. The company was formerly known as Tag Events Corp. and changed its name to Deer Consumer Products, Inc. in September 2008. Deer Consumer Products, Inc. is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

GKE.F.long_name: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd.
GKE.F.summary: Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells white household electrical appliances under the Hisense, Ronshen, Kelon, Hitachi and York brands in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company's products include refrigerators, residential air-conditioners, central air-conditioners, freezers, washing machines, kitchen appliances, and other electrical appliances. It also offers after-sales services and transportation services. The company was formerly known as Hisense Kelon Electrical Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Hisense Home Appliances Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

S9K.F.summary: Samson Holding Ltd., an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, markets, trades in, and sells residential and commercial furniture in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, the United States, Bangladesh, Vietnam, and internationally. It offers furniture for homes, as well as hotels and offices; and procurement services. The company markets its furniture products under the Universal Furniture, Miranda Kerr Home, Coastal Living Home Collection, Legacy Classic Furniture, Legacy Classic Kids, Craftmaster Furniture, Baker, Milling Road, McGuire, LacquerCraft Hospitality, Universal Furniture China and Athome, Rachael Ray, Paula Deen Home, Legacy, Craftmaster Furniture, Wendy Bellissimo, and Grand Manor brands. Samson Holding Ltd. primarily serves department stores, furniture stores, internet retailers, and mass merchant stores. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jiashan, China. Samson Holding Ltd. is a subsidiary of Advent Group Limited.

SNTW.summary: Summit Networks, Inc. provides chemicals and hazardous waste recycling services in China. The company offers services in chemical and hazardous waste collection, transfer, disposal, and recycling. It operates through three business lines: Waste Incineration, Waste Disposal, and Waste Utilization. The company also has pollution prevention facilities, including an incineration plant, an acidic and alkaline wastes disposal plant, and a hydrochloric acid waste comprehensive utilization plant. It serves customers in various industries, including fine chemical, healthcare and pharmaceutical, energy, and steel manufacturing. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Hengshui, China.
